casebody.data:
HERBERT M. GREGORY v. THE UNITED STATES [No. 45570] [102 C. Cls. 642 ;

326 U. S. —; 327 U. S. —]

Income tax; mailing notice to “last known address;” suit under special jurisdictional act; tort action for alleged •wrongful mailing.

*824Plaintiff’s petition for writ of certiorari denied by the Supreme Court October 8, 1945. Petitions for rehearing denied.
